content.body: Kaiido, Jake Archibald I've just found out that even this static HTML `<details open>` *already* fires an event.

content.body: Jake Archibald: do you know of any other HTML elements that fire events on programmatic changes? I'm specifically asking for elements, not "non-element" APIs like Navigation, LocalStorage, etc.
